rules.justification: The compilation target of an application must be a value that is allowed in a multi-tenant SaaS environment
The ID range assigned to the extension must be within the allowed range
The app.json file must specify an Azure Application Insights resource.
InternalsVisibleTo should not be used as a security feature.
There must be exactly one space character on each side of a binary operator such as := + - AND OR =.
There must be no space character.
There must be exactly one space character between the NOT operator and its argument.
Only use BEGIN..END to enclose compound statements.
Function calls should have parenthesis even if they do not have any parameters.
When BEGIN follows THEN, ELSE, DO, it should be on the same line, preceded by one space character.
The END, IF, REPEAT, UNTIL, FOR, WHILE, and CASE statement should always start a line.
Variable declarations should be ordered by type.
Substitute the IF THEN ELSE structure with a CASE.
Avoid using nested WITH statements.
Permission set extensions should not include permissions for objects defined in another application.
Permission set extensions should not include permission sets defined in another application.
Permission set extensions should not include permission sets which include permissions for objects defined in another application.
Permission set extensions should not include wildcard permissions.
The name of variables and parameters must be suffixed with the type or object name.
The name of temporary variable must be prefixed with Temp.
TextConst and Label variable names should have an approved suffix.
Lowering permissions should only be used in tests
Do not have identifiers with quotes in the name.
Use camel case property values in pages of type API.
Use camel case name for field controls in pages of type API.
Use camel case property values in queries of type API.
Use camel case name for column controls in queries of type API.
PagePart controls must not refer to parent pages.
A page of type API can only refer to the same subpage once.
String parameters must match placeholders.
Do not write code that will never be hit.
Do not declare variables that are unused.
Do not assign a text to a target with smaller size.
Do not declare parameters by reference if their values are never changed.
Only use AssertError in Test Codeunits.
Only find record if you need to use it.
The FindSet() or Find() methods must be used only in connection with the Next() method.
Only use a correct values of ApplicationArea.
Only write actions that have an effect.
Do not use identical names for local and global variables.
Use only a correct order for ApplicationArea.
When ApplicationArea is set to 'All', no other values for ApplicationArea should be specified.
When ApplicationArea is set to 'Basic', you must also specify 'Suite'.
To avoid confusion, do not give local variables the same name as fields, methods, or actions in the same scope.
To avoid confusion, do not give methods the same name as fields or actions in the same scope.
To avoid confusion, do not give global variables the same name as fields, methods, or actions in the same scope.
Variables must be initialized before usage.
The value assigned to a variable must be used.
The EventSubscriber method must be local.
Avoid non-indexed fields into filtering.
Avoids a runtime error from using CalcFields on a field that is not a FlowField or a field of type Blob.
Obsoleted object must have a state 'Pending' or 'Removed' and a justification specifying why this field is being obsoleted.
The local record should be modified before saving to the database.
Follow the style guide about the best practices for naming.
Use a text constant for passing user messages and errors without concatenations.
Use a text constant or label for format string in StrSubstNo.
You must write a tooltip in the Tooltip property for all controls of type Action and Field that exist on page objects.
The Tooltip property of Fields must start with 'Specifies'.
The value of the Tooltip property of Fields must be filled.
You must specify a OptionCaption property for all fields which source expressions is not a table field.
SIFT index should not be used on primary or unique key.
The value of the OptionCaption property of Fields must be filled in.
The count of option captions specified in the OptionCaption property is wrong.
You must specify a caption in the Caption property for Fields that exist on page objects.
The value of the Caption property of Fields must be filled in.
Optional return value should not be omitted in upgrade codeunits.
The local method must be used; otherwise removed.
Version should not be specified for internal assemblies.
StrSubstNo or string concatenation must not be used as a parameter in the Error method.
The FlowField of a table should be indexed.
Use Get(), FindFirst() and FindLast() without Next() method.
You must write a tooltip in the Tooltip property for all fields on table objects.
When using 'OnInstallAppPerCompany' you should also add 'Company-Initialize'::'OnCompanyInitialize' event subscriber.
The name of non-temporary variables must not be prefixed with Temp.
Email and Phone No must not be present in any part of the source code.
Use all lowercase letters for reserved language keywords.
Limit JIT loads by selecting all fields for load.
Running an upgrade codeunit is not allowed.
Do not use identical names for parameters and global variables.
To avoid confusion, do not give parameters the same name as fields, methods, or actions in the same scope.
Suppressing all diagnostics is not allowed.
Use namespaces.
Add 'this' qualification to improve readability.
You must use the FieldCaption method instead of the FieldName method and TableCaption method instead of TableName method.
The CalcDate should only be used with DataFormula variables. Alternatively the string should be enclosed using the <> symbols.
Placeholders should have a comment explaining their content.
Object ID must be in free range.
Field ID must be in free range.
Procedures must not subscribe to CompanyOpen events
Table definitions must have a matching permission set.
The compilation target of an application must be a value that is allowed in a multi-tenant SaaS environment
Encryption key functions must not be invoked.
Test assertion functions are not allowed in a non-test context.
Page controls and actions must use the ApplicationArea property
This app.json property must not be used for per-tenant extensions.
The extension name is too long.
The publisher name is too long.
InternalsVisibleTo should not be used as a security feature.
Entitlements cannot be defined in an extension.
Permission Sets should not be defined in XML files.
The extension name is not valid.
Permission set extensions should not include permissions for objects defined in another application.
Permission set extensions should not include permission sets defined in another application.
Permission set extensions should not include permission sets which include permissions for objects defined in another application.
Permission set extensions should not include wildcard permissions.
Use the 'application' property instead of specifying an explicit dependency on Base Application.
Defining reserved namespaces is not allowed.
The member ID should be within the allowed range
The enum ordinal value should be within the allowed range
The Web client does not support displaying the Request page of XMLPorts.
The Web client does not support displaying both Actions and Fields in Cue Groups. Only Fields will be displayed.
The Web client does not support displaying Repeater controls containing Parts.
A Blob cannot be used as a source expression for a page field.
Actions should use the Image property.
Pages and reports should use the UsageCategory and ApplicationArea properties to be searchable.
The Web client does not support displaying Repeater controls that contain FlowFilter fields.
The Web client only supports displaying Repeater controls in pages of type List, ListPart, and Worksheet.
Using a Blob with subtype Bitmap on a page field is deprecated. Instead use the Media/MediaSet data types.
A Repeater control used on a List page must be defined at the beginning of the area(Content) section.
Add PromotedOnly=true to some or all promoted actions to avoid identical actions from appearing in both the promoted and default sections of the command bar.
The Web client does not support properties for teaching tips in certain contexts.
Groups containing promoted actions should not be hidden.
Groups containing ActionRef targets should not be hidden.
Actions with scope repeater must be promoted.
Rich Text Editor fields are only allowed while alone in a FastTab group.
An error ocurred in a given rule. Please create an issue on GitHub
FlowFields should not be editable.
Commit() needs a comment to justify its existence. Either a leading or a trailing comment.
Do not use an Object ID for properties or variable declarations.
DrillDownPageId and LookupPageId must be filled in table when table is used in list page.
The casing of variable/method usage must align with the definition.
Fields with property AutoIncrement cannot be used in temporary table (TableType = Temporary).
Every table needs to specify a value for the DataPerCompany property. Either true or false.
Filter operators should not be used in SetRange.
Show info message about code metrics for each function or trigger.
Show warning about code metrics for each function or trigger if either cyclomatic complexity is 8 or greater or maintainability index 20 or lower.
Every object needs to specify a value for the Access property. Either true or false. Optionally this can also be activated for table fields with the setting enableRule0011ForTableFields.
Using hardcoded IDs in functions like Codeunit.Run() is not allowed.
Any table with a single field in the PK of type code or text, should have set NotBlank on the PK field.
The Caption of permissionset objects should not exceed the maximum length.
All application objects should be covered by at least one permission set in the extension.
Caption is missing. Optionally this can also be activated for fields on API objects with the setting enableRule0016ForApiObjects.
Writing to a FlowField is not common. Add a comment to explain this.
Events in internal codeunits are not accessible to extensions and should therefore be avoided.
If Data Classification is set on the Table. Fields do not need the same classification.
If Application Area is set on the TablePage. Controls do not need the same classification.
Confirm() must be implemented through the Confirm Management codeunit from the System Application.
GlobalLanguage() must be implemented through the Translation Helper codeunit from the Base Application.
Always provide fieldsgroups DropDown and Brick on tables.
Procedure or Trigger declaration should not end with semicolon.
Procedure must be either local, internal or define a documentation comment.
ToolTip must end with a dot.
Utilize the Page Management codeunit for launching page.
Event subscriber arguments now use identifier syntax instead of string literals.
Use CompareDateTime method in Type Helper codeunit for DateTime variable comparisons.
Set Access property to Internal for Install/Upgrade codeunits.
Use ReadIsolation instead of LockTable.
Clear(All) does not affect or change values for global variables in single instance codeunits.
The specified runtime version in app.json is falling behind.
The property Extensible should be explicitly set for public objects.
Explicitly set AllowInCustomizations for fields omitted on pages.
ToolTip must start with the verb Specifies
Do not use line breaks in ToolTip.
Try to not exceed 200 characters (including spaces).
The given argument has a different type from the one expected.
Explicitly set the RunTrigger parameter on build-in methods.
Empty Captions should be Locked.
AutoCalcFields should only be used for FlowFields or Blob fields.
Use SecretText type to protect credentials and sensitive textual values from being revealed.
Tables coupled with TransferFields must have matching fields.
Zero (0) Enum value should be reserved for Empty Value.
Label with suffix Tok must be locked.
Locked Label must have a suffix Tok.
Use Error with a ErrorInfo or Label variable to improve telemetry details.
SourceTable property not defined on Page.
SetFilter with unsupported operator in filter expression.
Do not assign a text to a target with smaller size.
The internal procedure is declared but never used.
The internal procedure is only used in the object in which it is declared. Consider making the procedure local.
Interface name must start with the capital 'I' without any spaces following it.
The suffix Tok is meant to be used when the value of the label matches the name.
Empty Enum values should not have a specified Caption property.
Enum values must have non-empty a Caption to be selectable in the client
PageVariable.SetRecord(): You cannot use a temporary record for the Record parameter.
Single quote escaping issue detected.
The ApplicationArea property is not applicable to API pages.
Pages of type API must have the ODataKeyFields property set to the SystemId field.
Mandatory field is missing on API page.
Consider naming field with a more descriptive name.
Missing ToolTip property on table field.
Event subscriber var keyword mismatch.
Duplicate ToolTip between page and table field.
Set NotBlank property to false when 'No. Series' TableRelation exists.
Informs the user that there are missing permission to access tabledata.
Empty statements should be avoided or should have a leading or trailing comment explaining their use.
Zero index access on 1-based List objects.
Incorrect 'IsHandled' parameter assignment.
The documentation comment must match the procedure syntax.
Handled parameters in event signatures should be passed by var.
Set values for FlowFilter fields using filtering methods.
Use return value for better error handling.
